properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 14 at 11:41AM MST until February 16 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Significant Blowing Snow Today across portions of Central
Wyoming...

...Winter Storm Watch for Far Western Wyoming Saturday Night
through Sunday night...

.A combination of strong wind and fresh snow will result in
considerable blowing and drifting of snow across southern Fremont
County into Natrona County this afternoon. A strong storm system
will likely bring significant snow across far western Wyoming
Saturday night through Sunday evening.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible.

* WHERE...South Lincoln County.

* WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening.

* SNOW AMOUNTS...3 to 6 inches. Forecasted snow amounts could
change as the details of this winter storm become clearer.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
